*150g Smolts Data*

Bringing in + organizing data 
```{r}
NKA_150gSmoltsData <- read.csv(file.choose())

NKA_150gSmoltsData 

Group <- NKA_150gSmoltsData$Group

Activity_Value <- NKA_150gSmoltsData$NKA


Fish<- NKA_150gSmoltsData$Fish

#Come back to this
NKA_150gSmoltsData %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
   pivot_wider(
    names_from = Group, 
    values_from = Activity_Value)
select(Fish, Group, Activity_Value)
 

rlang::last_error()
```

Plotting data 
```{r}

NKA_150gSmoltsData%>%  
  ggplot(aes(x = , y = Activity_Value, fill = Group, color = Group)) +
  geom_boxplot(outlier.colour="black", outlier.shape=16,outlier.size=2, notch=FALSE) +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=90,hjust=1,vjust=1)) + 
  xlab("Sampling Group") +
  ylab("NKA Activity (umol ADP/hr/mg protein)")
